content: I haven't put the app down yet. The price point was a little high, especially with out knowing what separates it, from other like apps. I have spent more on a single commander MTG deck. This app is phenomenal, in its ability to create, whatever type of army, miniature, or Character. (Personally, I have been working on space bugs that are grim and dark). I highly recommend this app

Would love to rate this 5 stars but i can't for the life of me find a definition of what all the symbols stand for. I know some are obvious but some are difficult to determine on what to label them as.
replyContent: Hi Jordan, the symbols are mentioned in our how to play videos, but for a quick explanation, they are purely for your reference and personalization. Although some symbols are more obvious than others, many are up for interpretation to the player. Ultimately, they can also help you find your units and weapons quicker in lists.

content: Excellent app to run, streamlines TTWG. Spectacularly great gameplay experience, fully customizable profiles, that QR scanner for lists and the in-app dice rollers are absolute godsends. "Oh I dunno about paying $-" "-pff, psh, pff I say, as if you don't have 1000's of dollars of unpainted figures and unread rulebooks already, Daniel; don't use 'oh noes ma monniez' as an excuse you're a bloody WARGAMER."
replyContent: Thank you for the review! We're delighted that you are enjoying our game. We have even more features and content planned ahead! We also hope that WARSURGE will save you a lot of money in the long run too!

content: Bold take on table top gaming. Plethora of design options and choices to really customize your force and make rules for "your dudes" decent polish on the overall all UI and app design. With unlimited design of your forces comes a double edged sword is that you have to input alot of data and pick every stat for every type of unit can be alot of intial work for someone trying to jump in. Now that i have built a soild library of units and weapons its quick but intial entry can be a chore.
replyContent: Thanks for the review! As more players join in, there will be more QR Codes being shared, which will provide instant Factions, Armouries and even Rosters.

content: Great game, reminds me a lot of older 40k but trimmed in a good way and not dumbed down. Would definitely recommend to any Wargamer or anyone who has an interest in miniatures games. I really hope this blows up and becomes super successful.
replyContent: Thank you for your review! We're excited to say that we have more features on the way.

content: A big highlight is that I can finally have my own profiles for my converted and kit bashed units. As a tabletop war game, there are so many options for playing which make the game huge. Going to take my time with this.
